Successful or failed connections to ente.Data: Zeek conn.log, Wireless Controller/Access Point Logs, RADIUS/802.1X Authentication Logs
Successful or failed connections to ente.Action: Monitor wireless access point logs and RADIUS authentication logs for connection attempts from unknown MAC addresses or devices not registered in asset inventory. Use frequency analysis on MAC addresses and device types connecting to the Wi-Fi. Investigate connections bypassing expected authentication mechanisms.

Unusual network traffic originating from.Data: Zeek conn.log, Windows Event ID 4624, Windows Event ID 4625, Windows Event ID 4688
Unusual network traffic originating from.Action: Identify dual-homed systems (wired and wireless connections). Monitor Zeek conn.log for traffic originating from these systems destined for the wireless network segment that seems anomalous in volume, destination, or protocol, potentially using correlation analysis with other host/network alerts on that system.
